name: Kale Orange Banana Smoothie
author: Georgina
summary: Sometimes it tastes like Fruit Loops® cereal, but, of course, this is actually good for you. My 14-month-old loves this for breakfast. Furthermore, he can feed himself (with a sippy cup) while I make breakfast and lunch for the older kids. The texture is similar to pudding. If runnier texture is desired, add ice or milk.
ingredients: 1 leaf kale, torn into several pieces
directions: Blend the orange in a blender until mostly juice
Add the water and kale; blend again on High speed until kale is liquefied
Break the bananas into chunks and add to the blender
Start blending on a lower speed until the banana is incorporated
Increase speed to blend the mixture into a pudding-like texture
